name: Cabin
description:
Relax.

Drink a beer. 

Stare at the moon. 

Paint the sky. 

A fleeting experimental game about spending time in a cabin.

You have seen everything there is to see once you've gone down the well. Feel free to hang out as long as you want.

"hellbent on meandering back and forth across the line between pretty and vomit-inducingly awful" - Rock Paper Shotgun

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Look 

Click - Interact/Pick Up/Throw

'b' - Drink Beer

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CREDITS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sounds from Freesounds.org

Music by Bon Iver

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thanks for playing! 

Crawlspace ~ 2016
